pathAssistantSteps.info:
1. Confirm implementation of corrective actions and identification of preventive actions.
  2. Customer Caretaker: Verify 8D Report fields (D1-D8) are completed and send full 8D to customer (Henkel=Mandatory, Other Customers = If requested).
  3. Continue documenting complaint costs (cleaning, disposal, analytical, rework, etc.).
  4. Change status to "Completed".

Customer Caretaker:

  1. Generate 5D Report and send to customer per Sales' direction. 
  2. Document customer feedback and attach evidence (if available).
  3. Continue documenting complaint costs (compensation, return fees, claim)
  4. Click "Mark Status as Complete" button.

1. Review complaint (case) details and assign case owner.
  2. Document team members that will be part of the investigation in the Case Team.
  3. Ensure the complaint description is clear.
  4. Document immediate (containment) actions.
  5. Click "Mark Status as Complete" button and continue investigation.

1. Customer Caretaker: Send 3D Report to customer(Henkel-Mandatory, Other Customers - If requested).
  2. During the investigation, determine if the complaint is justified or not justified using the Synthomer guidance.
  3. If justified, continue with full RCA. Select the primary root cause category. Continue to #5.
  4. If not justified, stop any further investigation, document reason in RCA field, select No in "Complaint Justified" field.
  5. Identify corrective actions, create in Lotus Notes, and document in Corrective Action text field.
  6. If complaint is related to a 3rd party supplier/carrier/haulier, select "Yes" in the "3rd Party Complaint" field and initiate a supplier NC.
  7. Complete remaining mandatory fields.
  8. Click "Mark Status as Complete" button and continue implementation/execution of corrective actions and identification of preventive actions.

1. The problem description should be summarized clearly so that anyone reading it can quickly understand what is being complained about.
  2. Add pictures, emails, and other evidence to the Files tab section to allow the case owner to start their investigation with as much information as possible.
  3. Click "Mark Status as Complete" button to initiate notification of case creation.
